name: 蒼葉
message: "Look, I guess they were bad dudes. I can't exactly blame you for going off like that."

name: クリア
message: "The one thing I can't stand is you getting hurt, Master. I don't care if I get hurt, as long as you're okay."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But you went way too far back there. I dunno if you snapped or what, but I was scared, man."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Really. You kicked the shit outta that guy. I thought you were gonna kill him!"
